pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with President Enrique Peña Nieto of Mexico | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with President Enrique Peña Nieto of Mexico on the margins of the G20 Summit in Hamburg, Germany.

The two leaders discussed a number of issues including regional peace, security and good governance, and the Canada-Mexico partnership.‎

The Prime Minister and the President also discussed the importance of the North American Free Trade Agreement for regional growth and economic prosperity, and reaffirmed their willingness to work to strengthen the agreement for the benefit of their people.
